title: How hard is it to get demoted to Bronze I?
body:
I have been constantly losing Ranked Matches at Silver 5 0LP but i haven't got demoted or even gotten the yellow/red warning sign. How hard is it to get demoted down a tier?

Jacca

replies.body:
It gives you a little warning symbol in your Profile when you are about to demote to a lower tier.

If you havent got the warning. then you should be fine

https://i.imgur.com/LTMQgVL.png
Demoted is basically impossible (for most Tier 5 people), the likelihood your in bronze next season is really high however.
thats aight, I can climb next season, but if i get demoted do I lose my silver border?
Nope, your border is awarded and the season is over, hence Pre-season.
You might lose rank soon then, if you go on a loss streak, it depends on your MMR as well, if thats at silver 5, you probably won't demote for a little while
If you've just been Promoted to silver 5, but haven't won a game yet you have a demotion Immunity, aka, you can't be demoted unless you win a game at 0LP Silver 5
I finished my provisionals in silver 5 and have been up and down 0LP and I have lost the past 3 or so games at 0LP but haven't gotten demoted.
Be me, thats a pretty easy method.
